description: Sexy Latino Leo Forte consistently dominates his opponents with the fluid, cat-like moves he's learned through years of training in the Brazilian art of Capoeira. Besides being as close to physical perfection as they come, Trent Diesel has years of Tae Kwon Do experience under his belt and has rightly earned a spot at the top of NK's best fighters. Put these two head to head on the mat and you know it's going to be one hardcore, balls to the wall match. But let's take it to the next level. How about we bind them together, arm to arm, so that there is no retreat from the action? The only thing hotter than that is the fiery sex round that follows. Brutal action leads to passionate fucking... This is one fight you will not forget!
title: Leo Forte vs Trent Diesel - The Bondage Match
